TopicTitle: How to close all these fuel tank hover dialogs?

Articles.Content:
For some reason, sometimes every fuel tank decides to show me exactly how much fuel it has left. How can I close all these that are slowing my machine to a crawl?

Edited October 24, 2013 by Oddible
You should be able to right click anywhere on the screen and it will get rid of them. If not, perhaps one of your keyboard keys is stuck; that can cause this kind of strange behavior.

When it happens to me i open the resource tab.

Tick the resource thats showing up then un tick it.
Hmm, no keyboard keys stuck. Rt-clicking was the first thing I tried, including rt-clicking the pod, which popped up the pod's dialog but left all the fuel dialogs open. Had to revert.

When it happens to me i open the resource tab.

Tick the resource thats showing up then un tick it.

Thanks that did it.
yeah, the mechjeb window overlaps the resource tab but it will click right through to whatever resource was under it.
Good god I wish I could slide that dern MechJeb tab to somewhere else on the screen.
